data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Ain't Done Yet!
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Big Waaagh!
data.description: Deals 309 Elemental damage.

data.name: Bigger, Better, An' Greener
data.description: Heals your target for 1033 health.This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it. (at RR100)

data.name: Bleed Fer' Me
data.description: You deal 1072 Elemental damage to your target over 24 seconds and your defensive target is healed for 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Brain Bursta
data.description: Deals 344 Elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Breath of Mork
data.description: Heals your target for 501 health every 3 seconds over 9 seconds. Each pulse also heals those around the target within 30 feet.

data.name: Bunch o' Waaagh
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing 344 Elemental damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Burst O' Waaagh!
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a spell that grants Waaagh!, an additional Waaagh! will be granted as well. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Da Waaagh! Is Coming
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Requires 13 points in Path of Gork
data.description: Deals 338 Elemental damage to your target, and will then damage another target within 20 feet of the last, damaging up to 9 different targets total. Targets can not be hit more than once by the ability.

data.name: Dat Makes Me Dizzy
data.description: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for 3 seconds after casting.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Do Sumfin Useful
data.description: Your target's Toughness is increased by 150 and they regain 952 health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Don' Feel Nuthin
data.note:
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
Target must be in your group or warband.
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier that absorbs up to 185 damage for up to 9 seconds.

data.name: Eeeek!
data.description: You blast back all enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by 20% for 10 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.

data.name: 'Ere We Go!
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional 125 Elemental damage on their next attack within 10 seconds.

data.name: Ere We Goes Again
data.description: Ere We Go will now deal 150 damage, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.

data.name: Extra Special Mushrooms
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.

data.name: 'Ey, Quit Bleedin'
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feelz No Pain
data.description: Heals all of your group mates within 100 feet for 1130 health over 10 seconds and decreases damage against them to 75% for 10 seconds

data.name: Fists of Gork
data.description: Deals 1200 damage and knocks back all enemy targets within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fury of Da Green
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Requires 13 points in Path of Da Green
data.description: A surge of Waaaagh explodes from your target and damages up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of them, dealing 277 Elemental damage to each, and bestowing 150% of it upon your group.

data.name: Gather Round
data.description: Heals group members within 100 feet for 643 health.

data.name: Geddoff!
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Requires 5 points in Path of Gork
data.description: Deals 205 Elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.

data.name: Gedup!
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.name: Get Movin'!
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain 150 points of Morale.

data.name: Git Outta Here!
data.description: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Gork Fix'd It
data.description: Gork'll Fix It becomes 35% better on allies, but 15% less effective on you.

data.name: Gork Sez Stop
data.description: Your target suffers 600 damage over 2s. If the target moves, the duration is restarted.

data.name: Gork'll Fix It
data.description: Your target regains 258 health immediately then continues to gain another 315 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Gork's Barbs'
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Requires 9 points in Path of Gork
data.description: Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for 10 seconds, and will deal 332 Elemental damage to anyone healing his new toy.

data.name: Green Cleanin'
data.description: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 468 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Greener 'n Cleaner
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: You cleanse an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 175 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hurts, Don't It?
data.description: Brain Bursta will now also reduce the victim's Toughness by 240 for 20 seconds, and they will lose 150 points of Morale as well.

data.name: I'll Take That!
data.description: Deals 277 Elemental damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Life Leaka
data.description: You deal 710 Elemental damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Look Over There!
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Lookit What I Did!
data.description: Gork'll Fix It will now also restore 40 Action Points to the target.

data.name: Mork Is Watchin'
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit enemies by 10%.

data.name: Mork's Buffer
data.description: Increases all resistances of your group mates within 100 feet by 157 for 1 hour.

data.name: Mork's Touch
data.description: All of your offensive spells gain a 25% chance to remove a Blessing from the victim. Any time that this successfully occurs, the enemy will suffer an additional 150 Elemental damage as well.

data.name: Nuthin' But Da WAAAGH!
data.description: Don' Feel Nuthin will also cause your target to deal 15% more damage as long as the barrier is protecting them.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Pass It On
data.description: Any time you heal an ally with a Path of Mork ability, there is a 25% chance that another ally within 30 feet of them will also gain 171 health as well.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Scuse Me!
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
Requires 5 points in Path of Da Green
data.description: A cone of energy strikes enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, dealing 338 Elemental damage and reducing their Elemental resistance by 236 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: An ally is charged with Waaagh for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds. Increases the value of healing effects on the target by 25% while active. If the allies health is reduced below 20%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore 711 health if they are still alive. A player may only be affected by a single Shrug it Off at a time.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Steal Yer Thunder
data.description: Reduces the stats of all enemies within 30 feet of your target by 25 (except wounds), and increases all your groupmember's stats by 25 (except wounds) for 15 seconds

data.name: Sticky Feetz
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select will have their Elemental resistance reduced by 236 and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Stop hittin' me!
data.description: Your chance to disrupt attacks is increased by 5%, and you Detaunt all enemies within 30 feet for 10 seconds, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Waaagh! Frenzy
data.description: Reduces the build time of I'll Take That! by 0.5 seconds but increases the cost by 10 Action Points

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Yer A Weaklin'
data.description: Everyone within 20 feet of your target will have their Strength, Intelligence and Ballistic Skill reduced by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Yer Not So Bad
data.description: Steals 180 Action Points from your target over 9 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuthin!
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Requires 9 points in Path of Da Green
data.description: Deals 284 Elemental damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: You Really Got Nuthin
data.description: Reduces You Got Nuthin's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: You Weren't Using Dat
data.description: Removes 100 AP from each enemy within 30 feet, and gives 50% of the stolen AP to you.

data.name: You'z Squishy
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Toughness reduced by 75 for 20 seconds.
